text: K kazhdomu cheloveku pristavleny angely, sleduyushchiye vperedi nego i pozadi nego i okhranyayushchiye yego po poveleniyu Allakha. Voistinu, Allakh ne menyayet polozheniya lyudey, poka oni sami ne izmenyat svoi pomysly. Kogda zhe Allakh vozzhelayet nakazat' lyudey, to etogo ne otvratit' nichem i net dlya nikh zastupnika, krome Nego
